changelog: Merged 1.4.3 improvements including trueDamageDealt tracking and healUsed field
Preserved all endless mode features: continue past wave 100, checkpoints every 50 waves
Sub-stepping and 5x/10x speed preserved for high-speed accuracy
All shiny egg/starter features intact (1/30 chance)
Asymptotic stat scaling prevents negative attack speeds at high levels
Auto-continue option for endless mode preserved
